text: @tedcruz Racism of Dept. of Commerce forced me to be ill-prepared for the coronavirus, COVID-19. Secretary Wilbur L. Ross, Jr. has supported and enabled racism and discrimination inside the DOC-USPTO since 2017.  DOC attorneys consistently engage in unethical and criminal acts.
